languages.text: "В регионе Эпсилон-II-Маджорис зафиксирована серия аномалий — сам Янус будто ополчился против нас там. Логистические цепочки пострадали. Единственные люди, которые посещают неподконтрольную территорию — немочи, массово бегущие вглубь региона. По ночам наблюдатели замечают странное свечение в небе, которое не регистрируется авгурами".

"A series of anomalies were recorded in the Epsilon II Majoris region — it is almost like Janus itself is fighting us there. Many logistical chains have been disrupted. The only people who visit the uncontrolled territory are the retches fleeing deeper into the region in greater and greater numbers. The observers report strange fires in the sky at night, completely imperceptible to the augurs."
languages.original_text: "В регионе Эпсилон-II-Маджорис зафиксирована серия аномалий — сам Янус будто ополчился против нас там. Логистические цепочки пострадали. Единственные люди, которые посещают неподконтрольную территорию — немочи, массово бегущие вглубь региона. По ночам наблюдатели замечают странное свечение в небе, которое не регистрируется авгурами".

traits.locale_text: "A series of anomalies were recorded in the Epsilon-II-Majoris region — it is almost like Janus itself is fighting us there. Many logistical chains have been disrupted. The only people who visit the uncontrolled territory are the wretches fleeing deeper into the region in great numbers. The observers report strange fires in the sky at night, completely imperceptible to the augurs."

languages.text: «Se ha registrado una serie de anomalías en la región Epsilon II Majoris. Es como si el propio Janus intentara expulsarnos de allí. Numerosas cadenas logísticas se han visto interrumpidas. Los únicos que se adentran en este territorio incontrolado son los degenerados, que acuden en cantidades cada vez mayores. Los observadores informan de fuego en el cielo por la noche, aunque los augures no logran ver nada».
languages.original_text: "A series of anomalies were recorded in the Epsilon II Majoris region — it is almost like Janus itself is fighting us there. Many logistical chains have been disrupted. The only people who visit the uncontrolled territory are the retches fleeing deeper into the region in greater and greater numbers. The observers report strange fires in the sky at night, completely imperceptible to the augurs."

traits.locale_text: «Se ha registrado una serie de anomalías en la región Epsilon II Majoris. Es como si el propio Janus intentara expulsarnos de allí. Numerosas cadenas logísticas se han visto interrumpidas. Los únicos que se adentran en este territorio incontrolado son los degenerados, que acuden en cantidades cada vez mayores. Los observadores informan de fuego en el cielo por la noche, aunque los augures no logran ver nada».

languages.text: « Des anomalies majeures ont été détectées dans la région d'Epsilon-II Majoris ; il semblerait que la planète Janus elle-même essaie de nous chasser violemment. De nombreuses chaînes d'approvisionnement sont perturbées. Les seuls habitants des territoires échappant à notre contrôle sont les infâmes qui fuient toujours plus loin, et en nombres toujours plus grands. Les observateurs font état de flammes étranges illuminant le ciel nocturne, mais totalement indétectables par les augures. »
languages.original_text: "A series of anomalies were recorded in the Epsilon II Majoris region — it is almost like Janus itself is fighting us there. Many logistical chains have been disrupted. The only people who visit the uncontrolled territory are the retches fleeing deeper into the region in greater and greater numbers. The observers report strange fires in the sky at night, completely imperceptible to the augurs."

traits.locale_text: « Des anomalies majeures ont été détectées dans la région d'Epsilon-II Majoris ; il semblerait que la planète Janus elle-même essaie de nous chasser violemment. De nombreuses chaînes d'approvisionnement sont perturbées. Les seuls habitants des territoires échappant à notre contrôle sont les infâmes qui fuient toujours plus loin, et en nombres toujours plus grands. Les observateurs font état de flammes étranges illuminant le ciel nocturne, mais totalement indétectables par les augures. »

languages.text: “伊普西隆二号主城区记录了一系列随之发生的异象，仿佛整个加努斯都在与我们对抗。多个地区物流链中断。目前，只有大批丑恶种仍在前赴后继地深入已经失控的地区。观察者报告称，夜空中出现奇异的火光，但俄歇矩阵完全没有扫描到类似的异象。”
languages.original_text: "A series of anomalies were recorded in the Epsilon II Majoris region — it is almost like Janus itself is fighting us there. Many logistical chains have been disrupted. The only people who visit the uncontrolled territory are the retches fleeing deeper into the region in greater and greater numbers. The observers report strange fires in the sky at night, completely imperceptible to the augurs."

traits.locale_text: “伊普西隆二号主城区记录了一系列随之发生的异象，仿佛整个加努斯都在与我们对抗。多个地区物流链中断。目前，只有大批丑恶种仍在前赴后继地深入已经失控的地区。观察者报告称，夜空中出现奇异的火光，但俄歇矩阵完全没有扫描到类似的异象。”

languages.text: 「イプシロンII・マジョリス地域にて一連の異常が記録された…まるでヤヌスそのものがそこで戦っているかのようです。多くの物流チェーンが途絶しています。未管理の領域を訪れるのは、この地域奥深くへと逃げ込む異民だけです。観測者たちは、夜空に奇妙な炎が見えると報告しているが、スキャナーではまったく感知できません」
languages.original_text: "A series of anomalies were recorded in the Epsilon II Majoris region — it is almost like Janus itself is fighting us there. Many logistical chains have been disrupted. The only people who visit the uncontrolled territory are the retches fleeing deeper into the region in greater and greater numbers. The observers report strange fires in the sky at night, completely imperceptible to the augurs."

traits.locale_text: 「イプシロンII・マジョリス地域にて一連の異常が記録された…まるでヤヌスそのものがそこで戦っているかのようです。多くの物流チェーンが途絶しています。未管理の領域を訪れるのは、この地域奥深くへと逃げ込む哀れな人々だけです。観測者たちは、夜空に奇妙な炎が見えると報告しているが、スキャナーではまったく感知できません」

languages.text: "Eine Reihe von Anomalien wurde in der Region Epsilon II Majoris aufgezeichnet – es ist fast, als würde Janus selbst uns dort bekämpfen. Viele Logistikketten wurden unterbrochen. Die Einzigen, die das unkontrollierte Gebiet noch besuchen, sind die Speier, die in immer größerer Zahl immer tiefer in die Region fliehen. Die Beobachter berichten von merkwürdigen Feuern am Nachthimmel, für die Auguren nicht wahrnehmbar."
languages.original_text: "A series of anomalies were recorded in the Epsilon II Majoris region — it is almost like Janus itself is fighting us there. Many logistical chains have been disrupted. The only people who visit the uncontrolled territory are the retches fleeing deeper into the region in greater and greater numbers. The observers report strange fires in the sky at night, completely imperceptible to the augurs."

traits.locale_text: "Eine Reihe von Anomalien wurde in der Region Epsiolon II Majoris aufgezeichnet — es ist fast, als würde Janus selbst uns dort bekämpfen. Viele Logistikketten wurden unterbrochen. Die einzigen Leute, die das unkontrollierte Gebiet noch besuchen, sind die armen Seelen, die in immer größerer Zahl immer tiefer in die Region fliehen. Die Beobachter berichten von merkwürdigen Feuern am Nachthimmel, für die Auguren nicht wahrnehmbar."

languages.text: "Epsilon II Majoris bölgesinde bir dizi anomali kaydedilmiş. Janus, orada âdeta bize karşı savaş açmış hâlde. Lojistik zincirlerin pek çoğu tamamen bozulmuş. Kontrol altında olmayan topraklara yalnızca leşler adım atıyor ve onlar da gittikçe artan sayılarla bölgenin çok daha derinlerine kaçıyorlar. Gözlemciler; gece göğünde alametler tarafından kesinlikle algılanmayan, tuhaf ateşler gördüklerini raporluyor."
languages.original_text: "A series of anomalies were recorded in the Epsilon II Majoris region — it is almost like Janus itself is fighting us there. Many logistical chains have been disrupted. The only people who visit the uncontrolled territory are the retches fleeing deeper into the region in greater and greater numbers. The observers report strange fires in the sky at night, completely imperceptible to the augurs."
